title: Bronze looking to climb!
body:
bronze 5 previously silver 4 looking to climb the ranks back to silver+, hit a rough patch and dropped quite quickly due to either me making simple mistakes or overall team errors, i use skype to speak if possible and always ready to receive criticism (constructive only) to improve my game and shot calling, i main Support ADC and jungle, if this interests you hmu in game. i play frequently and would like to build a list of people i can rely on to play with.

-ThreshXG

replies.body:
Add me, I'm B5 and don't play ranked much but sure! Most of the time I do well but my team feeds. (Not meming, the other day i had a 0/12 kassadin before laning phase finished.) Add me and I can start playing ranked!
I main jungle and can go AD or AP but prefer AD
Already added you thresh so if you want to play invite me :)

I'm a bronze 5 player who is improving (or trying to) my gameplay at the moment. At the moment, I queue Top/Mid but I can play any role but I'd rather play support in a fully managed team. I main Sona for support, Nocturne for mid, Graves for jungle, MF for adc and Ekko for top. I added you in game.
Ill play if you need me, i main Support and abit of Top lane if i ever get it XD dropped to Bronze 5 last night :/
I'll play with you if you want dude I already have you added XD

Hello, I having been bouncing from Bronze 1-3 for awhile and getting pissed off at solo play its making me want to quit haha. Main top/adc. You can rely on me as a good bronze/silver player, honest.  Add me, Might have a main mid as well, silver 5.
